about_the_game:
Unleash devastating power in this surreal third-person shooter. Charge orbs of raw energy in your hands to obliterate enemies in explosive bursts of particles. Bring down floating monoliths threatening the universe, and battle through a visually stunning sci-fi hellscape with supernatural abilities.

HARNESS ORBS OF ENERGY

Complete challenging objectives, adapt to ever-shifting threats, and master the flow of combat by harnessing powerful abilities and managing your most vital resource: energy.

Charge your shots for devastating impact, switching between tactical shot types like the pinpoint Supernova, the devastating Superheated, or the explosive Overcharged. Upgrade and adapt your arsenal through a branching ability tree, shaping your combat style to overcome any challenge.

DISMANTLE COLOSSAL MONOLITHS

Each level in MAXIMA: Keepers of the 2nd Law is a unique battleground, blending surreal environments with intense combat encounters. Fight through supernatural enemies while completing high-stakes objectives to dismantle the level’s central floating monolith. Destroy its tethered connections to unleash spectacular events that transform the landscape and drive the story forward.

When the monolith falls, brace yourself for an epic confrontation: a powerful boss awaits. Overcome the challenge, claim victory, and press on toward your mission’s ultimate goal.

WIELD GAME-CHANGING ABILITIES

Customize your Keeper with abilities unlocked from a branching skill tree. Enhance your combat prowess with upgrades like Blink for short-range teleportation, Shield to summon rocks that block incoming fire, or Recover to regain health. Unleash devastating powers like Polarise for area-of-effect damage, Barrage to charge all shots at once, or evolve your arsenal with upgrades like Supernova+ and Superheated+ for burst-fire attacks. Tailor your strategy with stat boosts and tactical perks that shape your playstyle, ensuring every choice matters in the fight for survival.

NAVIGATE CHAOTIC ENVIRONMENTS

From collapsing monoliths to falling debris, each level transforms during combat. Use shifting terrain and strategic orb clusters to gain an edge, but beware—your enemies will exploit the chaos just as much as you.

STOP THE HARVEST

Rogue entities have discovered how to harvest the energy-rich cluster fields to fuel their insatiable ambitions. This illegal exploitation destabilizes entire systems, threatening the natural balance of the universe. As a Keeper of the 2nd Law, your mission is to stop the harvest, destroy the monoliths draining the cluster fields, and restore order.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t, 2.4-3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CUs, 1.6GHz
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina)
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB AMD Radeon R9 M290 or better, 1.5GB Intel Iris 540 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Metal is required

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 (4 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 (8GB) or AMD RX VEGA 56
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
